code:
timeline
    title AdaptBMA Training Strategy
    section Phase 1 Warmup Epochs 0-2
        Ramp-up lambda_adv 0.0 to 0.4 : lambda_mmd 0.0 to 0.4
        Ramp-up lambda_grl 0.0 to 0.4 : Focus on classification
        Gentle introduction of adaptation : Both domains trained
    section Phase 2 Adaptation Epochs 3-5
        Full lambda_adv 0.4 to 1.0 : lambda_mmd 0.4 to 0.5
        Full lambda_grl 0.4 to 1.0 : Domain confusion via DANN
        Distribution alignment via MMD : Feature orthogonality enforced
    section Phase 3 Fine-tuning Epochs 6+
        Stable lambda_adv 1.0 : lambda_mmd 0.5
        Stable lambda_orth 0.01 : All values constant
        Convergence and target improvement : Source domain preservation
    section Validation Every Epoch
        Bag-level predictions : Pile-level aggregation
        Source and Target metrics : Monitor Target F1
        Early stopping patience 10 : Save best model checkpoint
